trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> event occurs when a property value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by one of the following properties changes: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> If one of these properties is set to a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object, however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> event does not occur.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>evento ocorre quando um valor de propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>objecto devolvido por uma das seguintes alterações de propriedades:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>se uma destas propriedades estiver definida como outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>de objeto, no entanto, o correspondente *PropertyName* `Changed` evento ocorre, mas a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>evento não ocorrer.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Style%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellStyleContentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A> property to determine which property has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> that changed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A>propriedade para determinar qual a propriedade tem o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>que foram alterados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property to retrieve the updated value.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>propriedade ao obter o valor atualizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve the updated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> property value.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para obter a atualização <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>valor da propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A> property to determine which property has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> that changed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A>propriedade para determinar qual a propriedade tem o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>que foram alterados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the scope that is affected by the changed cell style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o âmbito em que é afetado pelo estilo de célula foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Use the CellStyleScope property to determine which property has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> that changed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de CellStyleScope para determinar qual a propriedade tem o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>que foram alterados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property to retrieve the updated value.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>propriedade ao obter o valor atualizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleContentChangedEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleScopes"></xref> that indicates which <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> entity owns the cell style that changed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyleScopes"> </xref> que indica que <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> entidade detém o estilo de célula foi alterado.
